profile.title: Profile
profile.first: Electronic engineer with Colombian professional certificate, advanced English skills, and knowledge and interests on software development and IT.
profile.second: With professional experience on full stack development, using techonologies such as Angular, Bootstrap, NodeJS, SQL, NoSQL, AWS and Azure; quality assurance and automation testing using Selenium and Java, and also academic and research experience on other technologies such as React, Vue, Express, Sails, Python and JavaScript.
profile.third: With aptitudes of self-learning, adaptability to change and problem solving.
profile.fourth: Eager to learn and experience new things and situations that contribute to the professional, academic, cultural and personal growing.

accenture.description: Full time software developer. Activities and achievements reached
accenture.task1: Front-end development of web applications applying a micro front-end architecture using Angular.
accenture.task2: Microservices development using NodeJS and AWS Lambdas.

teleperformance.description: Activities related to customer service as a bilingual agent.

ibm.description: Intern at Global Business Services (GBS). Achievements reached
ibm.task1: Software testing (test cases statement and execution -manual and automated-) of web and mobile applications.
ibm.task2: Test automation with Selenium, Cucumber and SoapUI.

santoTomas.description: Three times best grade point average within all electronic engineering students.

uabc.institution: Universidad Autónoma de Baja California. México.
uabc.description: Academic Exchange, fifth semester. Broad scholarship.

aws.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
aws.description: Course for the certification “AWS Cloud Practitioner”.

devops.title: Azure DevOps
devops.description: Course for the exam “AZ-400 - Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions” exam by Microsoft. Which focuses on Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery, Continuous Deployment, Source Control and Monitoring of applications.

nextU.title: Software Development Certificate
nextU.description: It consists on the modules: “Python”, “Front End Technologies”, “Back End Technologies”, “Data bases”, “Git” and “JavaScript Frameworks”. NextU.

misionTIC.title: Misión TIC 2022
misionTIC.description: 600 hours course about local and web applications with Python, Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS and Flask. Ministerium of Information and Communication Technologies of Colombia.

sakura.title: SAKURA Exchange Program in Science
sakura.description: Broad scholarship for the “Robotics in Non-Verbal Communication Environments” course. Saitama University, Japan.

technologies.title: Software/Technologies/Frameworks
technologies.description: Angular+, React, Vue, Bootstrap, AJAX, JQuery, NodeJS, Serverless, AWS Lambda, Sails, Express, Flask, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, CouchDB, GIT, Selenium, Visual Studio, VSCode, LabView, Tia Portal, MATLAB, Simulink, Proteus, ORCAD, Multisim, PSpice, Microsoft Office.

programmingLanguages.title: Programming Languages
programmingLanguages.description: Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Python, SQL, NoSQL, C++, Ladder.

platforms.title: Methodologies/Platforms
platforms.description: Scrum, Agile, Microsoft Azure (as following-up system for projects and applications CI/CD platform), Jira (as following-up system for projects).

devices.title: Devices
devices.description: PLC, FPGA, PIC, Raspberry Pi, Arduino.
